summary: A couple of followers plus a wolf as a homage to Jon Snow and Ygritte
descriptionHtml:
This is just a small mod that I did during the pauses of my main WIP mod, got the idea after watching the new GoT trailer where we saw Jon going beyond the wall again.

This mod consists on a couple obvisouly based on Jon Snow and Ygritte plus Ghost but without being a complete copy, so that they can be their own characters. They will level with the player, are essential and possess unique gear that I made non-available to the player to get from them.

Requirements:
Skryim up to date and Dragonborn DLC

Location:
They have a small camp north of Solitude, there will be a map marker on your map to make it easier to find them.

Characters:

Jonathan Frost - He is a Nord who uses a Silver Sword (because like Jon Snow's sword this one is also more effective against undead plus the basic shape is almost the same unlike the Steel or Iron swords) with a frost enchantment, sometimes might use a regular long bow. Wears the Skaal armor with the following enchantments (Fortify One Handed, Resist Frost, Fortify Health Regen).

Igrid Frost - She is also a Nord that uses a Hunting Bow to fight with also a frost enchantment, might sometimes engage in melee combat with a dagger. Just like Jonathan she wears the same clothing with the same echantments except she has Fortify Archery instead of Fortify One Handed.

Phantom - He is an Ice Wolf loyal to Jonathan, will always follow him and will help in combat. He can not be a follower to the player, but if you have Jonathan as a follower, Phantom will go with both of you and aid in battle.Â 


I might revisit this mod to give it some tweaks, considering it was a quick mod done while I was "resting" from the other one I am making I suppose there might be some things to correct. Please give me your feedback on what you think should be changed/improved and why. Hope you enjoy it.
